alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion County through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittman, or 7 miles east of Emeralda, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Marion County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
